_header: Here endeth the book / Of virtue and of sin
_description: Colophon to the Speculum Vitae (423), which immediately precedes — two cross-rhymed quatrains joined with rhyming tails

TCD423.First Lines:
Here endiþ þe bookOf vertu and of
                    Synne…
TCD423.Last Lines: …And for hys synne wepe& in hys hert rewe
